meanings.definition: The act or process of making something internal or inward.
meanings.sent1: The interiorization of the new furniture gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: Her interiorization of her emotions helped her understand herself better.
meanings.sent3: The interiorization of the cake into his stomach was a quick process.
meanings.sent4: The interiorization of the secret weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The interiorization of the concept made it easier to grasp.

meanings.definition: The state of being internalized or made inward.
meanings.sent1: The interiorization of the company's values was evident in their employees' actions.
meanings.sent2: His interiorization of the trauma led to a period of self-reflection.
meanings.sent3: The interiorization of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The interiorization of the melody filled her with nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The interiorization of the knowledge transformed his perspective.
